package.name: Handy Dandy Functions
package.author: Dan Hoover
package.description: A collection of useful and versatile functions.

function.name: comLiDump
function.description: Dumps data to the output if a user is logged in.

function.name: comFormatSizeUnits
function.description: Converts bytes into human-readable file size units (e.g., KB, MB, GB).

function.name: comDelTree
function.description: Recursively deletes a directory along with all its contents.

function.name: comFormatDate
function.description: Formats a date string with optional full day name display.

function.name: comFormatUsaDate
function.description: Formats a datetime string into the USA date format (n/j/Y).

function.name: comFormatTime
function.description: Formats a time string with an optional display of seconds.

function.name: comFormatDt
function.description: Formats a datetime string (including time) into a standard format.

function.name: comFormatEt
function.description: Formats elapsed time into a human-readable string (e.g., hours, minutes, seconds).

function.name: comIntToTime
function.description: Converts an integer representing seconds into a formatted time string (HH:MM:SS).

function.name: comParseCamelCase
function.description: Converts a camelCase string into a spaced sentence.

function.name: comCompressImage
function.description: Compresses an image to a specified quality and saves it to a destination.

function.name: comNumberToVersion
function.description: Converts a numerical string into a formatted version string with three components (e.g., 1.23.45).
